rooms.description: Spacious open-plan living area with a modern contemporary aesthetic, featuring comfortable seating and ambient lighting. Vastu oriented towards the east for positive energy.
Dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with glass partitions for openness. Vastu orientation towards north to balance energy.
Fully equipped modern kitchen incorporating the latest appliances and efficient layout. Placed in the southeast for positive Vastu flow.
Primary bedroom with en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, located on the north side for enhanced privacy and Vastu compliance.
Secondary bedroom with ample space and built-in storage, oriented in the west to balance energies according to Vastu.
Third bedroom designed as a home office/guest room with adaptable layout and natural lighting, situated in the south for calm energy.
En-suite bathroom attached to master bedroom ensuring privacy and ease of access. Designed with modern fixtures and ample space.
Walk-in closet integrated into the master bedroom for additional storage and organization.
Private gym with state-of-the-art equipment, designed as a dedicated workout space. Positioned in the northeast to ensure positive energy flow according to Vastu.

openings.description: Double sliding glass door entrance from the garden leading into the living area. Positioned in alignment with Vastu principles for positive energy flow.
Direct entry to a two-car garage integrated beneath the cottage, ensuring convenience and security. The garage is designed to be low profile from the exterior.

amenities.description: Large landscaped garden surrounding the cottage providing natural light, ventilation, and an outdoor living space. Designed with indigenous plants in mind.
